text: hl akhbrkm- 'ayuha alnas- ealaa man tnzzal alshyatyn? tatanazal ealaa kl kdhdhab kthyr alatham min alkhnt, yastariq alshayatin alsme, ytkhtfwnh min almala alaela, fylqwnh 'iilaa alkhan, wman jaraa mjrahm min alfsqt, wa'akthar hwla' kadhbwn, yasduq 'ahaduhum fi klmt, fyzyd fiha 'akthar min miayat kdhbt
